result.eng: You will see the house on your left-hand side.

result.eng: They got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.

result.eng: Two men knocked her to the ground and stole her handbag.

result.eng: I am not too good. I have a pain in my hand.

result.eng: I have a bruise here. That is the place where I hit my hand on the car door.
